page.title: 18HOUSING IN MAPPERLEY
page.content: Mapperley Plains Primary ran a survey on housing in their area .The survey comprised a saturation survey of the catchment area and a scatter survey of each family in the school.The findings were:- Type of house % Det. Semi-Det.Bungalow Terrace Satur -ation 33 58 8 1 Scatter 53 40 7 - ______________________________________ Type of wall Type of roof % Brick Concrete Slate Tile Asphalt Satur -ation 100 - 52 47 1 Scatter100 - 39 61 - ______________________________________ Age of houses % Pre1900 1900-39 1945-70 1970- Satur -ation 5 73 18 4 Scatter 4 56 27 13
